sentences.sContent: Ben clicks, looks to me like once every half second, whereas a dolphin is actually making 900 clicks per second.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ben clicks, looks to me like once every half second, whereas a dolphin is actually making 900 clicks per second.
sentences.sCn: 我感觉本每过半秒就会发出一次‘咔哒'声，而海豚事实上每秒就发出了900次‘咔哒'声。

sentences.sContent: ...What he tried to do was to teach a male dolphin called Bass and a female called Doris to communicate with each other across a solid barrier...

trans.tranOther: a very intelligent sea animal like a fish with a long grey pointed nose
